## Operaciones Basicas
Las operaciones de matem치ticas,l칩gica y de asignaci칩n
$$
\hat{x}=\frac{\Sigma_{i=1}^{x_i}}{n}
$$

```{r Vector}
x=c(1:100)
x
```
```{r}
xi= sum(x)/length(x)
xi
```
Vectores con datos ausentes 
```{r Vector2}
x=c(1:10, NaN, 10:-20, NaN,27)
x
```
```{r}
xi= sum(x,na.rm = TRUE)/length(x) ##na.rm para remover los datos ausentes, si pongo la condici칩n FALSE me sale NaN porque no me remueve los datos. 
xi
```


## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
